text: Exnaboe, locally referred to as 'bö', is a settlement in the Virkie area of the parish of Dunrossness, South Mainland, Shetland, Scotland, overlooking Sumburgh Airport, and the Pool of Virkie. ==Sources== * This article is based on http://shetlopedia.com/Exnaboe a GFDL wiki. ==External links== *Canmore - Broch of Brough Head site record Category:Villages in Mainland, Shetland
title: Exnaboe
